name: Touhou Lucid Witch
description:
Enter the world of dreams as Marisa Kirisame, one of Touhou's main protagonists!

Plot Blurb

Marisa enters an intense lucid dream in order to try to find someone. Along the way, she has to contend with her own inner self doubts and insecurities. Can you help Marisa complete her dream?

Features

  • Two unique gameplay styles: flying and dodging
  • A fully-fledged story starring Marisa Kirisame (from the writers behind "Dance of the Inverted Heart" and "Touhou Sealing Song")
  • Three bonus minigames to play after the main campaign
  • Six remixes of Touhou songs by Wookywok
  • A plethora of drawings from DJThunderHeart

(White Screen Loading Bug: The screen will briefly flash white when loading flying levels.)

(Please note that some art assets are reused from some of my teams' previous Touhou Fan Game Jam Games)

Controls:

  • -Z: Select, Advance Text, Double Tap to fast forward through text, Jump
  • Arrow Keys: Navigate Menus, Change Lanes
  • X Key: Skip to the end of a line of text
  • 5 Key: Enters Windowed Mode
  • 6 Key: Enter Fullscreen Mode
  • Esc Key: Exits the game

Credits:

  • Megapig9001: Directing, Programming, and Writing
  • DJThunderHeart: Artwork (Check them out here)
  • Wookywok: Music and Sound Design (Check them out here)
  • MelinPie: Writing (Check them out here)
  • Special Thanks: CKenshin, SolarisSect
  • The following is a derivative work of the Touhou Project Series. Touhou and its characters, music and story are all owned by Team Shanghai Alice.
